oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ḥāwāshī Sharḥ Qāḍīʻzādah al-Rūmī ʻalá al-Jaghmīnī / lil-ʻAllāmah al-Muḥarrir Faṣīḥ al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Niṭāqī : manuscript, undated
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Niẓāmī, Faṣīḥ al-Dīn ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm , -approximately 1446
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, from 17 to 21 lines per pages, in black rubricated in red, in several hands.
With this is bound: Ḥāwāshī sharḥ Qāḍīʻzādah ʻalá al-Jaghmīnī / Mullāʻzādah al-Shirwānī (ff. 35r-92v).
Waqf statement: "B.l.kzade el-Hac Ömer Efendi vakfıdır."
Brockelmann (G, I, 473) gives the author's nisbah as Niẓāmī; but the ms has it twice (f. 1r and f. 1v) as al-N.ṭāqī.
MS Arab 289. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
